title: Passport to Progress

abstract: Produced by the Australian Commonwealth Film Unit for the Department of Immigration in 1957, this documentary examines the impact of immigration on Australia and looks at the part played by "New Australians" in the nation's development.
description: The impact on Australia of the immigration scheme and the part being played by New Australians in her progress.
